answers.answer: No.  You need to see a Dr.  Your numbers are not normal,  but see consistent with diabetes.Low carb diet,  weight loss if overweight,  exercise and, maybe medicine to get this under control.  Normal min diabetes numbers will be in the 4 - 6 range.

question: Hi. My sugar levels on waking up ( 5.30am) normally are around 6.2 but after 2hrs still fasting it goes go around 7.2. After meals the level goes to around 11.At themoment I am not on any medication. Please is that abnormal. Normally it comes back to the original level approximately after 4 or 5 hrs. Please advise the way forward for me because now I think I am a full diabetic
title: Abnormal sugar levels
